reviews.review_msg: You need to attend the lecture, because he does not post notes.  If possible get him for the tutorial, he has lots of facts and artifacts to share.

Notes were organized/clear. You have to go to the lecture because he doesn't post them online. It's important to get a good TA. Mine was Sarah Nickel and she was a hard marker.If you ask for her opinion on what you should talk about on ur paper, she tells you what you should write but still give u a bad mark even tho u followed her instructions.

Pretty good prof. GET A GOOD TA!!! The one I got was so brutal (Julia). Had no explanation for giving students bad marks so there was no way to improve. Cousins took over a tutorial one day and it was much better.
Good teacher. The only thing is he doesn't post notes online so you have to go to lecture every class. Also, there are a lot of notes so take a laptop or else your hand will get tired very quickly.
Cleary lecture notes.Excellence teacher I have seen before. Very nice smile, and very helpful.
